comments:
When the platform restarts while self-hosting (rc=23) on the restart we get 
an exception. I can't figure out why this would be happenning and right now do 
not have the time to chase it. So I'd recommend disabling the rc=23 handling in 
PDE. The only people impacted is the update team, and the restart does not work 
anyways (see below).

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/xml/sax/SAXParseException

	at

.java:643)
	at

m.java:540)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at

a:853)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoader.java:73
3)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:319)
	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:16)
Exception in thread "main"
No more restart by the self-hosting launcher.
